course_title: Introduction to Religion: The Powers of Pilgrimage
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
This course satisfies the Religion major requirement:- Theme. 
This course provides a thematic introduction to religious studies through the practice of pilgrimage. Through readings and films that will take us around the world and introduce us to several religious traditions, we will explore several definitions of religion, examine the experiences of religious believers, and consider the historical development of religious practice. The course will cover not only major pilgrimages around the world, but also ritual and pilgrimage in everyday life.
course_description: An exploration of diverse ways of being religious (for example, in thought, action, community, and experience) as they are displayed in several traditions and cultures.
